about_the_game:
About the Free Version


Our game, "Play A Match?: play a catch2", is available to play for free on the indie game platform "unityroom". The full version of the game adds a "Friend Matching System" to the free version. If you only plan to play random matches, purchasing the full version is not necessary.

About the Game


"Play A Match?" is a game where you engage in shootouts with strangers on an online riverbank. You play several rounds of quick shootouts where one hit means defeat, ultimately determining the final winner. A match can end in an instant, but sometimes you'll experience intense moments as strategies intersect and tension rises. Each match features random weapons, obstacles, throwable items, and respawn positions, ensuring a unique experience every time.

The full version includes a Friend Matching System, not available in the free version on "unityroom". This allows for play with acquaintances, connecting via voice chat, and is perfect for streamers to engage with their viewers for a fun and interactive experience.

Minimum:
  • Requires an Apple processor

  • Processor: Apple M1またはインテルCore M

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 8-compatible graphics card with at least 32MB of video memory
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Somewhere online, on a riverbank, a shootout with someone you don't know. A 1vs1 side-scrolling gun shooting. One shot to win or strategies intersect. Use random weapons, obstacles, to defeat someone you don't know. In Friend matches, you can play with someone you know, but please get along well.
